mainText.attr1: Instant action can be divined into these sections:
Player customizable - fleet versus fleet battles.
Player customizable - base versus base battles.
Instant Action mode is available from the main menu. You will then see unlocked Scenarios, and have access to the Arena and Skirmish buttons.
Instant Action in Void Destroyer evolved from the Battle Editor - which evolved as way of me having a tool to set up the game's mission and at the same time give the same map builder for player use.

As I was working on the game's missions - I realized that it would be great to be able to create one off scenarios that may or may not be related to the story. Giving unique challenges, or a different perspective, so Instant Action scenarios were added.
Players then requested an Arena mode and Skirmish mode - an easier/quicker way to set up battles besides using the slower battle editor.

Because I don't want to spoil the game's story/missions - but I want players to have access to all the toys that are avaiable to play with - in game objects have to be unlocked. The main way of unlocking them is via playing the story/mission game mode. Furthermore instant action scenarios will unlock ships featured in them. You can then add them in arena/skirmish modes as well as the battle editor.
